subject: [ANN] SilverMark's Enhanced JUnit
msgSnippet: Here s an announcement of an add-on for JUnit. Feel free to contact me directly with questions. We would be most appreciative if a link could be added to the
messageBody:
Here's an announcement of an add-on for JUnit. Feel free to contact me
directly with questions. We would be most appreciative if a link could be
added to the www.junit.org site, as well.

- Mike (msilverstein@...)

------------ cut here --------------

SilverMark is pleased to announce general availability of its Enhanced JUnit
V3.7, Java Unit testing tool.

This product extends the capabilities of the JUnit (www.junit.org) framework
to increase your testing productivity. To sign up for an evaluation copy,
and to view product information and an on-line demo, please visit:
http://www.javatesting.com/Product/enhancedjunit.

Product Features:
--------------------------
Enhanced JUnit is a suite of tools added to JUnit, all accessible from a
single menu in the JUnit runner view:

1. Automatic Test generation - Generate test cases and supporting test
assets

2. Load testing - Distribute your existing JUnit tests across hundreds or
thousands of concurrent threads and CPUs to validate that your system can
handle the necessary load. Graphically monitor test execution time in real
time to catch scalability problems.

3. Method coverage profiling - Find out which methods are being tested by
your JUnit tests and more importantly, which ones are not being tested

4. Data-driven testing APIs - create tests that iterate over test data,
without writing a lot of code.

5. Other convenience APIs and utilities

About SilverMark, Inc.
--------------------------------

SilverMark, 'The Object Testing Company' has provided testing and
productivity tools and services for systems developed with object-oriented
languages since 1996. SilverMark's products include:

o Enhanced JUnit: additions to the JUnit unit testing tool
o Test Mentor - Java Edition: enterprise component testing tool for Java
o Test Mentor - Smalltalk Edition: integrated GUI and component testing
tool for IBM VisualAge, and VisualWorks Smalltalk
o Connection Detangler: visual connection debugger for IBM VisualAge
Smalltalk
